subject: Hurricane Sandy (2012)
Basketball
Transit Systems
lead_paragraph: The most anticipated Brooklyn sports event in a half-century — the Nets’ debut at Barclays Center — will unfold as planned, despite lingering concerns in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy.
snippet: The most anticipated Brooklyn sports event in a half-century — the Nets’ debut at Barclays Center — will unfold as planned, despite lingering concerns in the aftermath of Hurricane Sandy.
